overview: He is a student, who believes in a true love. He writes short stories. One day he accidentally meets her. She is beautiful, but unpredictable. Not the type he has always dreamed of. She forces into his life, changing everything he was used to, and brings new adventures, which are sometimes painful for him. After sometime, he fells in love with her, but... one day, she disappears from his life, changing his life forever...
title: He and She
